item.title: 安装Redis
item.description: 1. 编译安装 wget https://codeload.github.com/redis/redis/tar.gz/refs/tags/7.0.4 -O redis-7.0.4.tar.gz tar zxf redis-7.0.4.tar.gz apt install build-essential cd /redis-7.0.4/src make install cd ../ sed -i 's|daemonize no|daemonize yes|' redis.conf sed -i 's|# supervised auto|supervised no|' redis.conf sed -i 's|bind 127.0.0.1 ::1|bind 0.0.0.0|' redis.conf sed -i 's|protected-mode yes|protected-mode no|' redis.conf sed -i 's|# requirepass foobared|requirepass czyadmin|' redis.conf mkdir /etc/redis cp redis.conf /etc/redis/ /usr/local/bin/redis-server /etc/redis/redis.conf vim /lib/systemd/system/redis.service [Unit] Description=Redis data structure server Documentation=https://redis.io/documentation Wants=network-online.target
